1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
3{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
4{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
5
6-- | Content operators.
7
8module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Misc
9  ( copsMisc
10    -- $Operators
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture          as O
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base              as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax            as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data              as D
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Coxhand       as H
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
19
20
21-- ----------------------
22-- $Operators
23--
24--  [@if@]        Conditional expression.
25--
26--  [@is@]        @x is f@ == @f x@.
27--
28--  [@of@]        @f of x@ == @f x@.
29--
30--  [@to@]        @x to f@ == @f x@.
31--
32--  [@type@]      Type of content.
33--
34
35-- | Content operators on miscellaneous.
36copsMisc :: (D.CContent c) => [D.Cop c]
37copsMisc =
38    [ D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal   "type")    copType
39    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal   "fill")    copFill
40
41    , D.CopCox   (D.copInfix    "is")      toInfix
42    , D.CopCox   (D.copInfix    "of")      ofInfix
43    , D.CopCox   (D.copInfix    "to")      toInfix
44
45    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInternal "#if")     copFunIf
46    , D.CopTree  (D.copNormal   "if")      copTreeIf
47    ]
48
49
50-- ----------------------  type
51
52-- /input [- X -]  /output [- type -]
53copType :: (D.CType c, D.Basis c) => D.CopCalc c
54copType arg =
55    do x <- D.getRightArg1 arg
56       D.putType $ D.typeOf x
57
58-- ----------------------  fill
59
60-- /input [- X -] [- X | empty -] ...  /output [- X -]
61copFill :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
62copFill = op . reverse where
63    op [] = Right D.empty
64    op (c' : cs') = do c <- c'
65                       case D.isEmpty c of
66                         False -> Right c
67                         True  -> op cs'
68
69-- ----------------------  is, of, to
70
71ofInfix :: D.CopCox c
72ofInfix [f, x] = Right $ H.ix f [x]
73ofInfix _ = Msg.adlib "require operand"
74
75toInfix :: D.CopCox c
76toInfix [x, f] = Right $ H.ix f [x]
77toInfix _ = Msg.adlib "require operand"
78
79-- ----------------------  if
80
81nameLeaf :: (O.Textual t) => S.BlankName -> S.TTree t
82nameLeaf = B.TreeL . S.TName B.def
83
84treeIf :: (O.Textual t) => S.TTree t -> S.TTree t -> S.TTree t -> S.TTree t
85treeIf test con alt = S.ttreeGroup [ nameLeaf $ D.copInternal "#if" , test, con , alt ]
86
87treeOrList :: (O.Textual t) => [S.TTree t] -> S.TTree t
88treeOrList [x] = x
89treeOrList xs = S.ttreeGroup $ (nameLeaf $ D.copNormal "or") : xs
90
91copFunIf  :: (D.CBool c, D.CEmpty c) => D.CopCalc c
92copFunIf [D.getBool -> Right testB, conC, altC]
93    | testB      = conC
94    | otherwise  = altC
95copFunIf xs = Msg.badArg xs
96
97--  if TEST -> CON | ALT 
98--  if TEST -> CON
99--  if TEST -> CON | TEST -> CON | TEST -> CON
100--  if | TEST -> CON | TEST -> CON | TEST -> CON
101
102copTreeIf :: forall t. (O.Textual t) => D.CopTree t
103copTreeIf trees = folding $ B.omit null $ S.divideTreesBy (`elem` ["|", ":"]) trees where
104    folding :: [[S.TTree t]] -> B.Ab (S.TTree t)
105    folding []        = Right $ B.TreeL $ S.rawTextToken ("()")
106    folding (x : xs)  = fore x =<< folding xs
107
108    fore :: [S.TTree t] -> B.AbMap (S.TTree t)
109    fore trees2 alt =
110        case S.divideTreesBy (== "->") trees2 of
111          [_]         -> back trees2 alt
112          [test, con] -> do test2 <- stairs (">>") ("<<") test
113                            Right $ treeIf test2 (S.ttreeGroup con) alt
114          _           -> abortSyntax trees2 "Expect E -> E"
115
116    back :: [S.TTree t] -> B.AbMap (S.TTree t)
117    back trees2 alt =
118        case S.divideTreesBy (== "<-") trees2 of
119          [alt2]      -> Right $ S.ttreeGroup alt2
120          [con, test] -> do test2 <- stairs ("<<") (">>") test
121                            Right $ treeIf test2 (S.ttreeGroup con) alt
122          _           -> abortSyntax trees2 "Expect E <- E"
123
124    stairs :: t -> t -> [S.TTree t] -> B.Ab (S.TTree t)
125    stairs del del2 xs =
126        do notInclude del2 xs
127           Right $ treeOrList $ map S.ttreeGroup $ S.divideTreesBy (== del) xs
128
129    notInclude :: t -> [S.TTree t] -> B.Ab ()
130    notInclude del xs =
131        case S.divideTreesBy (== del) xs of
132          [_] -> Right ()
133          _   -> abortSyntax xs "Mixed arrows"
134
135    abortSyntax xs msg =
136        B.abortable "if" xs $ Msg.unexpAttr msg
